dmca.title: Blogging game footage not cricket, Global Cricket Corp. complains
dmca.body:
NetResult Internal Reference: ICC_NRID14524
 
Please quote the above ICC_NR1D14524 reference in all communications with us regarding this issue.
 
Dear Sirs, 

We write on behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited who together own and control the worldwide broadcast rights for the ICC Cricket World Cup 2007. 

We have noticed that your website, http://cricketvideosunplugged.blogspot.com/ is displaying, promoting and/or offering audio, visual and/or audio-visual content from the ICC Cricket World Cup 2007. All copyright in such images vest with ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pfe Limited.
 
As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from the ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited to use this content, your present use is an infringement of the ICC Development (International) Limited
dmca.principal_name: ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited
